dt: {bc}to work with a tool with a thin flat blade on a long handle to cultivate, weed, or loosen the earth around plants {bc}to use or work with a hoe {dx_def}see {dxt|hoe:1||}{/dx_def} or backhoe
{bc}to weed, cultivate, or thin (a crop) with a hoe {dx_def}see {dxt|hoe:1||}{/dx_def}

shortdef: to work with a tool with a thin flat blade on a long handle to cultivate, weed, or loosen the earth around plants : to use or work with a hoe or backhoe
to weed, cultivate, or thin (a crop) with a hoe
